entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 9:23 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -12.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
